Package io.github.martinhelwig.utility.automouse

Interface AutoMouseInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoMouseCommon, AutoMouseTrayIcon
    public interface AutoMouseInterface
extends Runnable
    AutoMouseInterface is an interface for the program.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Helwig

    • Method Detail

      • moveMouse

        Point moveMouse()
         throws AWTException
        Moves the mouse if they is not at the same position as last move.
        Returns:
        the Point of the actual mouse location.
        Throws:
        AWTException - if there was an error while moving the mouse.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Point

      • moveMouse

        Point moveMouse​(Point point)
         throws AWTException
        Moves the mouse to the specific point.
        Parameters:
        point - the point where the move should move to.
        Returns:
        the Point of the actual mouse location.
        Throws:
        AWTException - if there was an error while moving the mouse.
        Since:
        1.0.0

        Parameters:

        messageType - defines the message priority

        void setCofiguration​(AutoMouseConfiguration configuration)
              throws IOException
        Sets the AutoMouseConfiguration which should be used.
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • isScreenLocked

        boolean isScreenLocked()
        Checks if the screen is actually locked.
        Returns:
        true if the screen is locked, false if the screen is not locked.
        Since:
        1.0.0
